description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant rossoCorsa colored box and a retroConsole button interface, this robot captures the essence of old-school gaming. Its soldier-like arms and legs provide stability and agility, allowing RetroBot to move with precision. The snake-shaped screen adds a touch of playfulness to its design, making it a favorite among gamers. To top it off, RetroBot is always ready for some serious gaming sessions with its trendy shades addon, making it the coolest companion in the club.
name: RetroBot
